text: ika a goda visayam: Adi i pattananloni iddaru anatha baluraku cendinadi. Dani krinda vari oka nidhi (patabadi) undi. Mariyu vari tandri punyapurusudu. A iddaru baluru yuktavayastulaina pidapa - ni prabhuvu karunyanga - tama nidhini, varu travvi tisukovalani, ni prabhuvu sankalpam. Idanta na antata nenu ceyaledu. Nivu sahanam vahincaleni visayala vastavam (tattvam) ide
